feed.title: Category: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night (PS1, 1997) (2)
entry.content:
I noticed today that I could download this for my Vita, since I already bought it for the PS3 back in 2008, so I downloaded it and showed it to my wife. I love the opening... fighting with Richter and then the abilitease. It's great.

Total time: 0:14

entry.title: Game: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night (PS1, 1997)
entry.content: I love this game. I'd like to beat it as Richter eventually.
